AssessmentQuestionResponse.name: AssessmentQuestionResponse
AssessmentQuestionResponse.description: Stores the responses submitted to an assessment.

AssessmentId.description: Required. The ID of the assessment associated with this record.

AssessmentQuestionId.description: Required. The ID of the assessment question associated with this record.

ChoiceValue.description: The response value when the question's data type is choice.

CurrencyValue.description: The response value when the question's data type is currency.

DateTimeValue.description: The response value when the question's data type is date time.

DateValue.description: The response value when the question's data type is date.

DecimalResponseValue.description: The response value when the question's data type is decimal.

ExtlAssessmentQuestionText.description: Stores the external assessment question text.

ExtlResponseValueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of a response to a question in an external assessment.

IntegerResponseValue.description: The response value when the associated assessment question's data type is integer.

IsTrueOrFalseValue.description: The response value when the question's data type is boolean.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of this record.

OriginType.description: Specifies the origin of the assessment question response.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who created the relationship record.

ParentAsmtQuestionVersionId.description: The ID of the related assessment question version associated with the assessment question response.

RespondentTimezone.description: The auto-generated timezone of the respondent submitting the assessment response.

ResponseText.description: The response value when the question's data type is text.

ResponseType.description: The data type of the response value submitted.

ResponseValue.description: The response value to the assessment question.

ResponseValueScore.description: The score of the assessment question response value.

ReviewerId.description: The person who reviewed and edited the response.

ReviewerRoleId.description: The role of the person who reviewed and edited the response.

TimeValue.description: The response value when the question's data type is time.
